question: Which state government has decided to teach ancient tribal language Gondi in tribal districts?
explanation: In Madhya Pradesh, ancient tribal language Gondi will be taught in tribal districts to save it from becoming a thing of the past. The rapid decline in the number of people who speak that tongue is a matter of concern; hence, Chief Minister Kamal Nath has decided to include Gondi in the primary education curriculum of the state\'s tribal-dominated districts.
